title: Jenna Dewan covers up her burgeoning baby bump in white floral dress while out with daughter Everly
text:
Jenna Dewan and partner Steve Kazee shared the news that they were expecting their first child together in late September.

For the past month the actress, dancer and author has been spotted showing off her blossoming baby bump in an array of figure-hugging outfits while out promoting her tell-all book Gracefully You: Finding Beauty And Balance In The Everyday.

But on Saturday, the soon-to-be mother of two, opted to cover up a bit in a white floral dress while out on an errand run with six-year-old daughter Everly.

Mommy-daughter time: Jenna Dewan, 38, took daughter Everly, six, out with her on an errand run in Los Angeles on Saturday

The loose-fitting number looked equal parts stylish and comfortable, especially for an expectant mom.

With the sun glaring down on another warm and sunny Southern California day, Dewan also donned a pair of strapped-sandals and carried a small purse over her left shoulder.

She rounded out her Saturday afternoon ensemble by wearing her dark brown tresses long and flowing well past her shoulders and with a part on the left.

Her daughter, whom she shares with ex-husband Channing Tatum, kept it sporty in rainbow-colored leggings, pink t-shirt and white sneakers.

Comfy style: The actress, dancer and author covered up her baby bump in a white floral dress

The day before, Dewan was one of the guest speakers at the TheWrap's Power Women Summit at Fairmont Miramar Hotel in Santa Monica.

During her time in the spotlight she shared about her personal journey in life that's the focus of her new book.

In it, she shares an uplifting message despite all of the frustrations and challenges that come with modern living.

Glowing: Dewan was one of the guest speakers at the TheWrap's Power Women Summit at Fairmont Miramar Hotel in Santa Monica on Friday

Dewan and Kazee started dating in October 2018, about four months after she and Tatum confirmed their split after more than eight years of marriage.

In fact they decided to separate about three months prior, in January 2018.

Tatum, who is best known for his roles on Magic Mike, White House Down and The Hateful Eight, has now moved on and is dating British singer, Jessie J.
description: Jenna Dewan covered up her burgeoning baby bump in a white floral dress while out on an errand run with daughter Everly in Los Angeles on Saturday.
